summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 11, Wallingford's Division of Green Lake Addition, being the alley from Woodlawn Avenue to Wallingford Avenue, between North 51st Street to North 52nd Street, by paving the same, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 99818 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
